message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $130. I believe it holds significant value for you, and this price reflects its worth.
I appreciate your confidence in the product's value, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. I'm willing to pay a premium, but I need to stay within my budget.
I understand your budget constraints, Bob. How about we meet in the middle at $110? This offer reflects the true value of the product.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. How about we meet at $95? I'm willing to pay a bit more, but I need to get closer to my target.
